original_text: ‘The Lord is slow to anger and abounding in steadfast love, forgiving iniquity and transgression, but he will by no means clear the guilty, visiting the iniquity of the fathers on the children, to the third and the fourth generation.’
korean_text: 여호와는 노하기를 더디하시고 인자가 많아 죄악과 허물을 사하시나 형벌 받을 자는 결단코 사하지 아니하시고 아버지의 죄악을 자식에게 갚아 삼사대까지 이르게 하리라 하셨나이다

sentences.original_text: The Lord is slow to anger
but he will by no means clear the guilty
sentences.korean_translation: 결코 죄 있는 자를 사하지 아니하시고

sentences.original_text: visiting the iniquity of the fathers on the children
to the third and the fourth generation.
